price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߖߊ߬ߕߋ߬ߓߐ ߕߍ߫ ߝߏߦߌ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߐ߫ ߣߴߊߟߎ߫ ߓߍ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߐ߲߫ ߠߊ߫
arabic: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: in ḥisābuhum illā ʿalā rabbī law tashʿurūna
